scripts.start:dev: npm run start:client:build & npm run start:dev --prefix booshka-rest-api
scripts.start:install: npm install & npm i -g @nestjs/cli & npm i -g @angular/cli & npm i -g @angular-devkit/build-angular & npm install --prefix booshka-client & npm install --prefix booshka-rest-api
scripts.build: npm run start:install & npm run start:client:build & npm run start:server:build
